sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { FutureBookings } from "./FutureBookings" import { AcceptDenyButton } from "./AcceptDenyButton" import "./BookingForm" export const Requests = () => { const [requests, setRequest] = useState([]) const navigate = useNavigate() // const localFatBackUser = localStorage.getItem("fatback_user") // const fatbackUserObject = JSON.parse(localFatBackUser) useEffect( () => { fetch(`http://localhost:8088/requests?_expand=genre`) .then(response => response.json()) .then((requestInfo) => { setRequest(requestInfo) }) }, [] ) return (<>
{requests.length ?

Studio Requests

{requests.map(request => { return (<>
Band Name: {request.bandName}
Phone Number: {request.phoneNumber}
Start Date: {request.startDate}
End Date: {request.endDate}
No. of Songs: {request.numOfSongs}
Genre: {request?.genre?.type}
Musicians: {request.musicianRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Session Musicians: {request.sessionMusicians === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Photos: {request.photoRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Video Request: {request.videoRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
{/*
{requests.isAccepted === false ?
Status: pending
:
Accepted!
}
*/}
{requests.isAccepted || !requests.isDenied ? : ""}
) })}
:
FatBack currently has no booking requests.
}
{ navigate("/futurebookings") }}>

See your future bookings

) }
